body_html: I was facing similar issues, copying large amounts of data from numpy to TF by using a FIFOQueue manually. I moved all the data loading and preprocessing into the graph (using https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/reading_data/index.html) and jpeg_decode, resize_images etc functionalities, and it sped up the training significantly.

body: I was facing similar issues, copying large amounts of data from numpy to TF by using a FIFOQueue manually. I moved all the data loading and preprocessing into the graph (using https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/how_tos/reading_data/index.html) and jpeg_decode, resize_images etc functionalities, and it sped up the training significantly.
